title: Adding people for Flexing/Norms games. ^_^
body:
Am looking to add people that just wanna mess around and have fun or what not... Am currently Plat 1 if that makes a difference but I have other accounts I can play on if my ranks to high for flex etc. Won't matter if we play norms.

Am able to Discord/League chat if that is what you prefer but I am not fussed either way.

My IGN is 'Smol Wolfy' feel free to add me... I am not bothered about what rank you are and I don't expect you to do well just looking for people to play the game with and have fun.

Thanks ^_^/.

replies.body: hello i would love to play some norms with u and have some fun on league
